typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(ETLdate = currentDate(),
	partitionBy('hash', 3,
		ETLdate
	)) ~> DerivedColumn1
